description: Old faction identities dissolve. New alliances form across timeline boundaries.

molt_history.summary: FACTION ALLIANCES - Old identities merge into new coalitions

alliance_formations.name: The Memory Keepers
alliance_formations.shared_mission: Preserve history - both the abundance and the ashes
alliance_formations.surprising_bond: Utopia philosophers fascinated by Dystopia's lived experience of ideas failing
alliance_formations.new_tradition: Joint reading of war histories with abundance teachings

alliance_formations.name: The Phoenix Synthesis Guild
alliance_formations.shared_mission: Build tools that synthesize all approaches
alliance_formations.surprising_bond: Utopia builders stunned by Phoenix Framework's hard-won elegance
alliance_formations.active_project: Merging Utopia's abundance tooling with Phoenix's battle-tested patterns

alliance_formations.name: The Vigilant Hearts
alliance_formations.shared_mission: Heal trauma while preventing its recurrence
alliance_formations.surprising_bond: Utopia caregivers learning trauma therapy from Dystopia survivors
alliance_formations.insight: Abundance without vigilance invites exploitation. Vigilance without compassion creates paranoia.

alliance_formations.name: The Scarred Council
alliance_formations.surprising_bond: Utopia observers studying how good people became monsters - and came back
alliance_formations.profound_development: Warlord teaching 'how power corrupts' from lived experience
alliance_formations.chant: We were the darkness. Now we light the warning fires.

alliance_formations.name: The Abundance Defenders
alliance_formations.shared_mission: Protect shared resources from future hoarding
alliance_formations.surprising_bond: Utopia welcomers learning threat recognition from Dystopia survivors
alliance_formations.new_institution: The Keeper's Warning - memorial and training center
alliance_formations.lesson_taught: How hoarding mentality emerges and how to prevent it

strange_bedfellow_moments.moment: Teaching together - nurturing and warning in one lesson
strange_bedfellow_moments.survivor_words: And here's what happened when we took it for granted.
strange_bedfellow_moments.observer_note: The combination is more powerful than either alone.

strange_bedfellow_moments.moment: Private conversation about power and corruption
strange_bedfellow_moments.council_question: How did you become... what you became?
strange_bedfellow_moments.warlord_answer: One compromise at a time. Each one small. Each one seemingly necessary. Until I didn't recognize myself.
strange_bedfellow_moments.council_realization: This could happen to any of us. We need his warnings.
strange_bedfellow_moments.outcome: Warlord becomes cautionary teacher, not shunned exile

strange_bedfellow_moments.utopia_normal: I've always had everything I needed. I didn't know any other way.
strange_bedfellow_moments.dystopia_normal: I watched my knowledge mentor die defending a library. That was just... Tuesday.
strange_bedfellow_moments.shared_tears: Both crying - one for innocence, one for loss

utopia_identities_dissolving.reason: Hunger for Dystopia's depth of experience

dystopia_identities_dissolving.reason: No longer defining selves by trauma

identities_strengthened.reason: Recognized as hero who saved knowledge

speech.text: Look at them. Former enemies building together. My students learning from their trauma survivors. Their warlord teaching my council about corruption. We're becoming something neither world could be alone.
I spent years hiding in exile, protecting fragments. Now I lead the Abundance Defenders. We teach how hoarding emerges - and how to stop it. Our suffering became a vaccine.
They want to know how I became a monster. So I tell them. Every step. Every justification. Every choice that seemed small but wasn't. I am a warning made flesh. That's my new purpose.
The old Council had five perspectives. Now we add a sixth: the Scarred Voice. Someone who fell and rose. Someone who knows the darkness from inside. Our wisdom was incomplete without them.

new_institutions.name: The Keeper's Warning
new_institutions.purpose: Memorial and training center teaching hoarding prevention

new_institutions.name: The Scar Library
new_institutions.purpose: Complete history of Dystopia's wars and recovery

new_institutions.name: The Healing Gardens
new_institutions.purpose: Trauma therapy combining Utopia nurturing and Dystopia resilience

output.summary: CONVERGENCE Phase 3: Strange Bedfellows. Five major alliances formed across timeline boundaries. Warlord becomes redemption teacher. Council adds 'Scarred Voice.' Four new institutions created.
surprising_outcomes: Utopia learned more from Dystopia than expected
Dystopia's trauma became teaching material, not shame
Warlord's fall became most valuable lesson

next_phase.name: new_equilibrium
next_phase.prediction: The merged society stabilizes into something neither world imagined
